short_summary: Procurement, office & desk accessories and office furniture
description: Public Delivery and installation of office and desk accessories and office furniture to the regions that are mentioned in the regionsInformation  fields below.
full_summary:
### Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) Workspace SA Categories 1, 2, 5 - CNSC

#### Reference and Solicitation Information

*   **Reference Number**: cb-135-94065995
*   **Solicitation Number**: 5000076955
*   **Publication Date**: October 16, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date**: October 27, 2023, at 2:00 PM
*   **Amendment Number**: 6

#### Contract Information

*   **Contract Type**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
*   **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
*   **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
*   **Contracting Entity**: Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission (CNSC)
*   **Contracting Entity Contact**:
    *   Name: Janie Latouche
    *   Email: <solicitation-demandedesoumission@cnsc-ccsn.gc.ca>
    *   Phone: (000) 000-0000

#### Products and Services Required

*   **UNSPSC Codes**:
    *   44110000 - Office and desk accessories
    *   56101700 - Office furniture
*   **Tender Description**: The proposed procurement involves the acquisition, delivery, and installation of Workspace SA categories 1, 2, and 5 prior to the December holidays.

#### Proposers

*   The Government of Canada invites proponents to submit their proposals for this tender opportunity. To access the tender package, please visit [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca).
*   Proposed submissions should be sent to the address specified in the tender package. Late proposals will not be accepted.

#### Excluded Proposers Category

*   Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission (CNSC) tender evaluation and award may be subject to [Canada’s Trade Agreements](https://www.traderefereencanada.gc.ca/en/service-trade-agreements).

---
Lee Cheng [CCTS 2023]  

Contact Information: *Supply Chain Manager* at [CCTS](https://www.ccts.ca/). Follow me:[@leechencheng](https://linkedin.com/in/leechen) [Twitter](https://www.twitter.com/supplychaiman)
